unnormalised: Hey! Always been curious about Ayurveda. Heard great things about Kerala Ayurvedic treatments near Kochi. My cousin, Priya, swears by it for stress relief! She went last Diwali. Anyone tried it? Did it involve crazy diets, like just rice kanji? Thinking of trying it myself for the upcoming Onam holidays. Worth the Rs. 10,000+ price tag for a week? Share your experiences!
